title: How to make PWAs re-engageable using Notifications and Push
summary: Having the ability to cache the contents of an app to work offline is a great feature. Allowing the user to install the web app on their device is even better. But instead of relying only on user actions, we can do more, using push messages and notifications to automatically re-engage and deliver new content whenever it is available.
